subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jaromir Jagr and Max Talbot both scored in the Flyers’ win, and Evgeni Nabokov made 29 saves to lead the Islanders to a victory.
snippet: Jaromir Jagr and Max Talbot both scored in the Flyers’ win, and Evgeni Nabokov made 29 saves to lead the Islanders to a victory.
